title: R - Open Research Summer School
text:
First Steps
Some of the most basic things you can do in R is are basic mathematical operations. In your Console, type the following code lines and press Enter.

# sum
1 + 2

# substract
2 - 4

# multiply
4 * 4

# divide
3/2

By the way: Code lines, that are preceded by a # are commented out, and will not be evaluated.

title: R - Open Research Summer School
text:
4 Workflow
When only coding in our Console, we quickly run into the question where to save our code for further evaluation.

title: R Workshop
text:
The following tutorial will teach you the basics of R. It is designed to be self paced, so you can work in you own tempo.



Learn the basics of programming in R as needed for the rest of the Open Research Summer School.
